pre: ^Detective, please give me some time to collect my thoughts.
^Could you please investigate the crime scene first?
^I will try my best to cooperate when I am ready.
main: ^Today is literally the worst day of my life.
question1: ^Detective, what do you want to know?
^Were there other customers before the victim?
^I don't have any more questions for now.

answer1: ^It wasn't a popular period for our cafe.
answer2: ^The owner, I have never touched it other than serving it.
answer3: ^Yes, he is a regular customer, always sitting at the same spot.
answer3version2: ^Professor is a regular customer. He always sits at the same table there.

b: ^I have tried my best to provide the most accurate information...

conclusion: ^I hope you find the murderer soon, detective. I am really scared now.

post: ^Sorry, I really can't recall anything else for now...
